main event: A Yellow Cab driver in Pittsburgh reported seeing lights that he initially thought were falling stars, which descended slowly and had fiery trails.
interesting points: The driver observed at least 20 similar objects over the last two years.,Mr. Johnson and another witness saw a light that descended and turned around in a semi-circle.,The lights appeared to burst up like searchlights a thousand feet above the ground.,The official documents reveal interest from the Air Force regarding these meteor sightings., The report includes correspondence with the American Meteor Society related to the observations.
witness description: A Yellow Cab driver and two other individuals
